targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  evt_time AS "time",
  
  ueid
FROM f_ue_common_id
WHERE s_bcnid= $S_BcnId
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  s.evt_time AS "time",
  s.s_bcnid
FROM f_ue_common_id s
WHERE s.s_bcnid= $S_BcnId
AND s.ueid='$mc'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  reg_time AS "time",
  to_char(reg_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss:ms') AS REG_TIME
  FROM f_ue_registration
WHERE s_bcnid= $S_BcnId
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  reg_time AS "time",
  to_char(evt_time AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Kolkata','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss:ms') AS deREG_TIME
  FROM f_ue_deregistration
WHERE s_bcnid= $S_BcnId
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  reg_time AS "time",
  (select count(*) from lqr l where l.s_bcnid=$S_BcnId) as LQR_COUNT
  FROM f_ue_deregistration
WHERE s_bcnid= $S_BcnId
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  evt_time AS "time",
  payloadbytesreceived
FROM lqr
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(evt_time)
  and s_bcnid = $S_BcnId
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  evt_time AS "time",
  payloadbytessent
FROM lqr
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(evt_time)
  and s_bcnid = $S_BcnId
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  evt_time AS "time",
  numofuelqrs
FROM lqr
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(evt_time)
  and s_bcnid=$S_BcnId
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  evt_time AS "time",
  discardulpdudownlink
FROM lqr
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(evt_time)
  and s_bcnid=$S_BcnId
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: No Of UPlink BCN PDU's Discarded
